data.meanings: drinking-cup when there is in it something to drink. Sometimes it can refer to the drink itself, e.g. wine. If there is no beverage in it, the drinking cup is called  Qadehun (root: Qaf-Dal-Ha).
data.sentence: The word وَكَأْسًا comes from the root ك ا س and is associated with the meanings: drinking-cup when there is in it something to drink. Sometimes it can refer to the drink itself, e.g. wine. If there is no beverage in it, the drinking cup is called  Qadehun (root: Qaf-Dal-Ha).

data.meanings: To fill up, pour forth (a cup).
data.sentence: The word دِهَاقًا comes from the root د ه ق and is associated with the meanings: To fill up, pour forth (a cup).
